[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: AssignmentOperation(
            Assign {
                left: List {
                    items: [
                        ListItem {
                            key: Some(
                                Literal(
                                    String(
                                        LiteralString {
                                            value: "'foo'",
                                            span: Span(
                                                3,
                                                6,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ),
                            value: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            3,
                                            15,
                                        ),
                                        name: "$a",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                        ListItem {
                            key: Some(
                                Literal(
                                    String(
                                        LiteralString {
                                            value: "'bar'",
                                            span: Span(
                                                3,
                                                19,
                                            ),
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                            ),
                            value: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            3,
                                            28,
                                        ),
                                        name: "$b",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                        },
                    ],
                },
                equals: Span(
                    3,
                    32,
                ),
                right: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                34,
                            ),
                            name: "$foo",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            },
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                3,
                38,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
